function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for further lockdown re-instatement at a local or national level","Impact":"Continued disruption to public health, the economy, and daily life","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccine distribution technology","People":"General population, businesses, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, businesses"},{"Description":"Unintended adverse consequences on health and wellbeing due to global efforts to reduce the transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Negative effects on physical and psychological health, especially among vulnerable groups","Mitigation":"Better informed lifestyle measures, access to health resources, and support for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health platforms","People":"Vulnerable groups, older people, general population","Owner":"Health organizations, government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of insight into lifestyle measures to mitigate impacts of COVID-19 on health and wellbeing","Impact":"Inadequate support for vulnerable groups, prolonged negative effects on health and wellbeing","Mitigation":"Conducting research on lifestyle measures, promoting access to health resources","Technologies":"Data analytics, health tracking apps","People":"Vulnerable groups, older people, general population","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations, government"}]}
